'''Radiant Spincrystal 1''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Dawn Winery Theme (City of Winds and Idylls)|Dawn Winery Theme]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next on top of a barrel near [[Ernest]] outside of [[Dawn Winery Manor]].
